verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] promised to demand the Justice Department investigate whether his campaign was " infiltrated " for political purposes .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: promised] [ARG2: to demand the Justice Department investigate whether his campaign was " infiltrated " for political purposes] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has promised to [V: demand] [ARG2: the Justice Department] [ARG1: investigate whether his campaign was " infiltrated " for political purposes] .
President Donald Trump has promised to demand the Justice Department investigate whether his campaign [V: was] " infiltrated " for political purposes .
President Donald Trump has promised to demand the Justice Department investigate whether [ARG1: his campaign] was " [V: infiltrated] " [ARGM-CAU: for political purposes] .
